name: My Body Coach 3
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor. Slimming, fitness and relaxation: your well-being coach in your own home! - Create and record your own fitness sessions or let yourself be guided by a personalised coaching programme. - Your movements are corrected in real time with Kinect™. - New: relaxation and stretching!
